page.title: 17FINZEAN SCHOOL:EDUCATION.
page.content: The 23 pupils are taught by 2 teachers(with visiting specialists in PE, Home Economics, Music and Art){in {a family atmosphere, on an individual {basis according to age, aptitude, and {ability.}The lively curriculum is broad-based with Environmental Studies central to its planning and philosophy :due emphasis on reading, writing, maths, science, aesthetic and creative subjects.Swimming instruction is given at Aboyne Academy pool weekly and educational outings are frequent. Much enjoyed are sports meetings with other schools, and community activities. The 1984 HMI Report described the school thus-'a happy,hard-working school which offers a firstclass modern education.'The Headteacher,relieved of teaching duties one half day per week, has 4 hrs secretarial help for admin.
